otp.title: OTP Email Generator
otp.instruction: Enter your email to receive your OTP code
otp.invalid: Invalid email address. Only stephaniestudio@motionisme.io is supported.
footer.description: Website to receive and display OTP email codes automatically.
hero.title: OTP Email Generator
hero.subtitle: Receive and display OTP email codes automatically
hero.description: This website allows you to receive OTP codes from specific emails. Enter stephaniestudio@motionisme.io to get your OTP code.
features.title: How It Works
features.step1.title: Enter Email
features.step1.desc: Type email stephaniestudio@motionisme.io in the OTP generator page
features.step2.title: Click Generate
features.step2.desc: Press the Generate OTP button to process your request
features.step3.title: Get Code
features.step3.desc: 6-digit OTP code will appear automatically on screen
